FuncDef: The authorization-mode command configures an authorization mode for an authorization scheme. The undo authorization-mode command restores the default authorization mode in an authorization scheme. By default, local authorization is used.
CLIs: authorization-mode { hwtacacs | if-authenticated | { local | local-case } | ldap } [ none ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the user is authorized by an HWTACACS server.
-

Indicates that only the user who succeeds in authentication is authorized. The configuration of if-authenticated authorization does not take effect in RADIUS authentication.
-

Authenticates users locally and sets local user names to case-insensitive.
-

Authenticates users locally and sets local user names to case-sensitive.
-

Indicates that the user is authorized by an LDAP server.
-
